# Cyberhygiene Essentials: Course Resources

This page contains additional resources, references, and tools to support your learning journey in cyberhygiene and digital security.

## Essential Security Tools

### Password Management
- [Bitwarden](https://bitwarden.com/) - Free, open-source password manager
- [1Password](https://1password.com/) - Premium password manager with family plans
- [KeePassXC](https://keepassxc.org/) - Offline, open-source password manager
- [LastPass](https://www.lastpass.com/) - Popular password manager with free tier
- [Password strength checker](https://password.kaspersky.com/) - Test your password strength

### Multi-Factor Authentication
- [Authy](https://authy.com/) - Multi-device authentication app
- [Google Authenticator](https://googleauthenticator.net/) - Basic authentication app
- [Microsoft Authenticator](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/mobile-authenticator-app) - Authentication with backup
- [YubiKey](https://www.yubico.com/) - Hardware security keys
- [2FA Directory](https://2fa.directory/) - List of sites supporting 2FA

### Device Security
- [Windows Security](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/stay-protected-with-windows-security-2ae0363d-0ada-c064-8b56-6a39afb6a963) - Built-in Windows protection
- [macOS Security](https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/set-security-privacy-preferences-mh11784/mac) - macOS security settings
- [Malwarebytes](https://www.malwarebytes.com/) - Malware protection and removal
- [BitLocker](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/information-protection/bitlocker/bitlocker-overview) - Windows disk encryption
- [FileVault](https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/encrypt-mac-data-with-filevault-mh11785/mac) - macOS disk encryption

### Privacy Protection
- [DuckDuckGo](https://duckduckgo.com/) - Privacy-focused search engine
- [Firefox Focus](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/browsers/mobile/focus/) - Privacy browser for mobile
- [Privacy Badger](https://privacybadger.org/) - Browser extension to block trackers
- [uBlock Origin](https://ublockorigin.com/) - Efficient content blocker
- [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail) - Encrypted email service

### Mobile Security
- [Android Security Checklist](https://www.android.com/safety/) - Google's recommendations
- [iOS Security Guide](https://support.apple.com/guide/security/welcome/web) - Apple's security documentation
- [Signal](https://signal.org/) - Secure messaging app
- [Lockdown Mode](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT212650) - Enhanced iOS security
- [Find My Device](https://www.google.com/android/find) - Android device tracking

### Browser Security
- [HTTPS Everywhere](https://www.eff.org/https-everywhere) - Force HTTPS connections
- [Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/new/) - Privacy-focused browser
- [Brave](https://brave.com/) - Privacy-focused browser with ad blocking
- [ClearURLs](https://clearurls.xyz/) - Remove tracking elements from URLs
- [Cookie AutoDelete](https://github.com/Cookie-AutoDelete/Cookie-AutoDelete) - Auto-clear cookies

## Practical Security Guides

### Official Security Guidance
- [NIST Cybersecurity Framework](https://www.nist.gov/cyberframework) - Comprehensive security framework
- [CISA Security Tips](https://www.cisa.gov/tips) - US government security recommendations
- [UK National Cyber Security Centre](https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/section/advice-guidance/all-topics) - UK government guidance
- [Australian Cyber Security Centre](https://www.cyber.gov.au/resources-business-and-government) - Australian guidance
- [EU Cybersecurity Agency](https://www.enisa.europa.eu/topics/cybersecurity-education) - European resources

### Step-by-Step Tutorials
- [Consumer Reports Security Planner](https://securityplanner.consumerreports.org/) - Personalized security recommendations
- [EFF Surveillance Self-Defense](https://ssd.eff.org/) - Digital security tutorials
- [Citizen Lab Security Planner](https://securityplanner.org/) - Custom security advice
- [SANS OUCH! Newsletters](https://www.sans.org/security-awareness-training/ouch-newsletter) - Monthly security topics
- [Take Control of Your Online Privacy](https://www.takecontrolbooks.com/online-privacy/) - Comprehensive guide

### Identity Protection
- [IdentityTheft.gov](https://www.identitytheft.gov/) - US government identity theft resource
- [Have I Been Pwned](https://haveibeenpwned.com/) - Check if your data has been breached
- [Credit freezes](https://www.consumer.ftc.gov/articles/what-know-about-credit-freezes-and-fraud-alerts) - Guide to credit freezes
- [Annual Credit Report](https://www.annualcreditreport.com/) - Free credit reports
- [Data broker opt-out guide](https://www.consumerreports.org/privacy/how-to-delete-your-information-from-people-search-sites/) - Remove personal information

### Scam Prevention
- [FTC Scam Alerts](https://www.consumer.ftc.gov/features/scam-alerts) - Latest scam warnings
- [Phishing examples](https://www.phishing.org/phishing-examples) - Learn to identify phishing
- [Fraud.org](https://fraud.org/) - Consumer fraud resources
- [BBB Scam Tracker](https://www.bbb.org/scamtracker) - Report and find scams
- [WhatsApp scam guide](https://faq.whatsapp.com/general/security-and-privacy/staying-safe-on-whatsapp/?lang=en) - Messaging app security

## Security Assessment Tools

### Personal Security Checks
- [Security Planner](https://securityplanner.org/) - Personal security assessment
- [NCSC Cyber Aware](https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/cyberaware/home) - Security check tools
- [Mozilla Privacy Not Included](https://foundation.mozilla.org/en/privacynotincluded/) - Product security reviews
- [Panopticlick](https://coveryourtracks.eff.org/) - Browser fingerprinting test
- [ShieldsUP!](https://www.grc.com/shieldsup) - Network vulnerability test

### Password Security
- [Have I Been Pwned Passwords](https://haveibeenpwned.com/Passwords) - Check if password is compromised
- [Password Strength Test](https://www.security.org/how-secure-is-my-password/) - Estimate password cracking time
- [Bitwarden Password Generator](https://bitwarden.com/password-generator/) - Create strong passwords
- [Diceware Password Generator](https://www.rempe.us/diceware/#eff) - Memorable strong passwords
- [NIST Password Guidelines](https://pages.nist.gov/800-63-3/sp800-63b.html) - Official password standards

### Privacy Checkups
- [Google Privacy Checkup](https://myaccount.google.com/privacycheckup) - Google settings review
- [Facebook Privacy Checkup](https://www.facebook.com/privacy/checkup/) - Facebook privacy tools
- [Apple Privacy](https://www.apple.com/privacy/manage-your-privacy/) - Apple privacy settings
- [Microsoft Privacy Dashboard](https://account.microsoft.com/privacy/) - Microsoft privacy controls
- [Amazon Privacy Settings](https://www.amazon.com/hz/privacy-central/data-requests) - Amazon privacy tools

### Network and Device Security
- [Shodan](https://www.shodan.io/) - Check exposed devices
- [Wireshark](https://www.wireshark.org/) - Network traffic analyzer
- [GRC's DNS Benchmark](https://www.grc.com/dns/benchmark.htm) - DNS performance and security
- [HTTPS Checker](https://www.jitbit.com/sslcheck/) - Website SSL configuration
- [Wireless Diagnostics](https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/use-wireless-diagnostics-on-mac-mchlp1065/mac) - WiFi security check
